item.title: Dwarves Radar Program
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Radar Program The Dwarves have a spinning radar. This radar is how we assess and adopt new technology. Throughout the years, we observe the tech industry and pick out the most promising tech to put into the radar to begin the assessment process.

item.title: Sharing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sharing At Dwarves Foundation, we believe that sharing is an important part of our culture. We share almost everything: every week, a lot of events are open to the public, and some of them are recorded so that anyone can watch the videos to learn.

item.title: Showcase
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Showcase Every Friday afternoon, everyone in the company is invited to gather on Discord for internal demos of projects teams have been working on.
